steps: step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
step 2: Click on link 'Samsung' -> Navigate to page 'category/samsung'
step 3: Click on link 'By title'
step 4: Click on svg
step 5: Click on label
step 6: Click on label
step 7: Click on button ' Buy'
step 8: Click on link ' Place an order' -> Navigate to page ''
step 9: Click button and proceed to checkout page
step 10: Click on input field 'delivery id'
step 11: Click on input field 'shipping address.first name'
step 12: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.first name'
step 13: Click on input field 'shipping address.last name'
step 14: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.last name'
step 15: Click on input field 'shipping address.address line 1'
step 16: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.address line 1'
step 17: Click on input field 'shipping address.zip'
step 18: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.zip'
step 19: Click on input field 'shipping address.city'
step 20: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.city'
step 21: Click on input field 'shipping address.state'
step 22: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.state'
step 23: Click on input field 'shipping address.phone'
step 24: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.phone'
step 25: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO PAYMENT' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
step 26: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
